column2: "You'll be transferred to the front shortly! These apostles of Dark Falz Loser are your primary objective. Take them out!"
"I think this fight is going to be a real challenge. There's little more I can do for you... I'll be here, hoping for your safe return!"

"This is an emergency missive to all ARKS
operatives. An infested mothership is
approaching, believed to be carrying
Dark Falz Loser and its apostles. As soon
as you are ready, sortie and take out the
hostiles while searching for Dark Falz.
This is an executive order and it
takes priority over anything else.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area. time limit expires."
